original_text: But you yourself must continue to think seriously and clearly. Be patient and brave when troubles come. Continue to tell the good news about Christ to people. Do all the work that God has given you to do as his servant.
korean_text: 그러나 너는 모든 일에 신중하여 고난을 받으며 전도자의 일을 하며 네 직무를 다하라

sentences.original_text: But you yourself must continue to think seriously and clearly
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너는 계속해서 진지하고 명확하게 생각해야 한다

sentences.original_text: Be patient and brave when troubles come
Continue to tell the good news about Christ to people
Do all the work that God has given you to do
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 네게 하라고 주신 모든 일을 하라
